rule.description: Ignore alerts from remote desktop msrdc
Ignore alerts from remote desktop msrdcw
Ignore alerts from Adobe for x86
Ignore alerts from Cisco Collab Host
Ignore alerts from Webex
Ignore alerts from HP Hotkey Service
Ignore N-able scriptrunner alert
Ignore wsmprovhost alert
Ignore N-able agent and manager alert
Ignore Possible Golden Ticket attack or AD Certificate Service Abuse for PRTG monitoring software
Ignore Possible Golden Ticket attack or AD Certificate Service Abuse for Domain Controller File Service software
Ignore chome app alert
Ignore Office alert
Ignore N-able agent and manager alert
Ignore alerts from remote desktop msrdc in app dir
Ignore wsmprovhost alert
Ignore N-able agentservice alert
Ignore alerts where all onedrive .exe processes access Explorer.EXE on all devices
Ignore alerts where office clicktorun processes access Explorer.EXE on all devices
Ignore Creative Cloud alert from Adobe
Ignore N-able manager agent service alert
Ignore audio service from Realtek driver
Ignore n-able remote desktop service on local host
Ignore Possible Golden Ticket attack or AD Certificate Service Abuse for FAR 2,3,4 and 5 and research account
Ignore benign Power Automate Desktop telemetry file creation (DataCollection-Bookmarks.json).
Suppress QUEENCREEK-related cmd.exe activity: $(win.eventdata.commandLine)
Suppress Bitdefender SFX activity: $(data.win.eventdata.image) created $(data.win.eventdata.targetFilename)
Suppress Microsoft Office SDXHelper JavaScript drop: $(data.win.eventdata.image) created $(data.win.eventdata.targetFilename)
Suppress Power Automate Desktop activity: $(data.win.eventdata.image) created $(data.win.eventdata.targetFilename)
Suppress Adobe Creative Cloud CCX registry query via cmd.exe: $(data.win.eventdata.commandLine)
Suppress Firefox background update JS write: $(data.win.eventdata.image) created $(data.win.eventdata.targetFilename)
Suppress Adobe Acrobat Native Messaging via Chrome: $(data.win.eventdata.commandLine)
Suppress Lenovo Vantage update loading taskschd.dll: $(data.win.eventdata.image)
Suppress Microsoft wuaucltcore.exe loading ucrtbase.dll from Windows Temp: $(data.win.eventdata.imageLoaded)
Suppress benign VS Code installer access to Explorer (access=0x40): $(data.win.eventdata.sourceImage)
Suppress N-able ScriptRunner PowerShell automation library load: $(data.win.eventdata.image)
Suppress Mozilla Firefox uninstaller loading ShellLink.dll from temp: $(data.win.eventdata.imageLoaded)
Ignore n-able software from using svchost.
Ignore invoke powershell from kusto explorer app on FAR systems
Suppress Microsoft mscorsvw to access dll
Suppress N-able Reactive accessing Explorer with full access rights (0x1f3fff): $(data.win.eventdata.sourceImage)
Excluded benign Explorer.EXE read-access by Microsoft Remote Desktop Client (msrdc.exe): $(data.win.eventdata.sourceImage)
Excluded cmd.exe execution by Azure GuestAgent extension handler (enable.cmd): $(data.win.eventdata.commandLine)
Excluded benign read/query access to Explorer.EXE by svchost.exe (N-able AVDefender): $(data.win.eventdata.sourceImage)
Excluded Windows Error Reporting (WerFault.exe) crash dump for svchost.exe: $(data.win.eventdata.targetFilename)
Excluded Windows servicing DLL load by TiWorker.exe: $(data.win.eventdata.imageLoaded)
Excluded benign PowerShell automation library load by Lenovo ImController CompanionApp: $(data.win.eventdata.imageLoaded)
Excluded legitimate kernel crash dump by System process: $(data.win.eventdata.targetFilename)
Excluded DLL drop by Windows Defender engine (MsMpEng.exe): $(data.win.eventdata.targetFilename)
Excluded Office SDXHelper JavaScript package write: $(data.win.eventdata.targetFilename)
Excluded valid PowerShell automation DLL load by N-able AutomationManager: $(data.win.eventdata.imageLoaded)
Excluded cmd.exe execution by Azure GuestAgent's CollectGuestLogs.exe: $(data.win.eventdata.commandLine)
Ignore alerts coming from client regarding PSScriptPolicyTest in numeral subdir.
Ignore chome update alert
Allow legitimate HP OneAgent activity related to Explorer process access
Ignore Figma accessing Explorer alert
Ignore TeamViewer update file creation alert
Ignore alerts where explorer.exe downloads Chrome updates
Ignore alerts where compatibility script access getpaths
Ignore alerts where chrome access .js files
Ignore "System user successfully logged to the system" alert for nobody user login.
Ignore alerts from smss accessing winlogon
Ignore alerts from wix website builder
Ignore alerts from Logitech Utility Installer
Ignore alerts from NVWMI driver
Ignore HP One Agent software update alert
Ignore Wix software update alert
Ignore chome update javascript alert
Suppress Microsoft mscorsvw to access dll
Ignore legitimate SYSTEM-context csc.exe compilations that drop DLLs in C:\ORG\user across all endpoints
Ignore legitimate SYSTEM-context DismHost.exe ApiSet DLL loads from C:\ORG\user\SSS_* on all endpoints
Ignore legitimate SYSTEM-context PowerShell Script-Policy self-test in C:\ORG\user on all endpoints
Ignore interactive-user Chrome extension installation files under ORG\user*\CRX_INSTALL on all endpoints

rule:
92213 -->
(?i)^C:\\\\(?:Program\\sFiles(?:\\s\\(x86\\))?|Users\\\\[^\\\\]+\\\\AppData\\\\Local)\\\\TeamViewer\\\\ORG\user$
(?i)^C:\\\\Users\\\\[^\\\\]+\\\\AppData\\\\Local\\\\Temp\\\\TeamViewer\\\\update\\.(?:exe|dll|dat|tmp|log|json)$
(?i)^true$ (?i)^Valid$ (?i)^TeamViewer(\s+GmbH)? (?i)^TeamViewer
(?i)^(?!NT\\s+AUTHORITY\\\\)(?!NT\\s+SERVICE\\\\)(?!NT\\s+SYSTEM)(?!LOCAL\\s+SERVICE)(?!NETWORK\\s+SERVICE)[^\\\\]+\\\\[^\\\\]+$
Suppress TeamViewer self-update drops (update.*) in Temp\\TeamViewer for interactive users only

rule.description: Ignore TeamViewer updater loading its own signed DLLs from NSIS temp folder (nsu*.tmp) – benign self-update behaviour.
Ignore legitimate SYSTEM context TiWorker loads of Microsoft signed DLLs from C:\ORG\user\SSS_* on all endpoints
ALERT – TiWorker.exe loaded an unsigned/tampered DLL **or** a DLL from an unexpected Temp path. Possible servicing stack tamper or novel attack: investigate immediately.
Suppress TeamViewer SYSTEM context updater DLL loads in ORG\user*.tmp across all endpoints
Ignore interactive user Google Updater file drops in ORG\user* when the file is Google-signed and the signature is valid.
Ignore Defender ATP SYSTEM context inventory script (GUID path + scriptBlockId) across all endpoints

Ignore legitimate Servicing Stack DLL loads: TiWorker.exe (SYSTEM) loading Microsoft signed DLLs from C:\ORG\user\SSS_* \downlevel\ during Windows Update. Any deviation re-enables the normal Sysmon EID 7 alert flow.
Suppress Microsoft mscorsvw to access dll
Ignore N-able AVDefender alert
Ignore N-able AVDefender alert
Ignore BeAnywhere support alert
Ignore Adobe Core Sync alert
Ignore python javascript dependency alert
Ignore application compatibility database start
Ignore Remote Desktop accessing msi file
Ignore Windows Error Reporting Manager from accessing explorer.exe
Ignore legitimate HandlerUtilities.psm1 execution (Microsoft Defender for Servers extension)
HandlerUtilities.psm1 modified/added/deleted – possible path-hijack of Defender extension
Ignore Microsoft-signed ScriptBlocks written by MDATP DataCollection (all agents)
Ignore Zoom from accessing explorer.exe
Ignore alerts where Chrome unpacker pdates
Ignore application compatibility database start
Ignore access to windows task scheduler
Ignore Visual Studio Code accessing explorer.exe
Ignore Logitech Options application from accessing explorer.exe
Ignore Windows MRT from accessing explorer.exe
Ignore Figma software alert
Ignore Figma software alert
Ignore mic tray alert
